data.title: HSBC
data.details: ui coding, UI development and Support

pagetemplate.projectbusinessline: HSBC Holdings plc is a British multinational universal bank and financial services holding company. It is the largest bank in Europe by total assets, with US$2.953 trillion as of December 2021
pagetemplate.responsibilities: Set Requirement, details requirement gather for third party technical implementation, Demo and partial implementation of chat tools, understand inner application complexity and final bug fixing
pagetemplate.software: Technical Analysis, Design understanding from liveperson team, Front-end Development, Unit testing, Bug fixing, TOOLS: MS Office, HTML5/CSS3, Javascript, GIT, QC tool and others

moredetails.title: Process and research
moredetails.description: login to liveperson and understand how their application works. Research and understanding design with liveperson team, updating their demo application. setup meeting with entity team to understand the pro cons. creating a separate branch for development.Development and testing and push to final branch.

moredetails.title: DESIGN REQUIREMENTS
moredetails.description: Add their dependency and start development and necessary code changes. Creating test cases. Hence HFD already created, so we implemented the respective changes. Auth: https://authentication.liveperson.net/login.html
